title: Rito Labeler Console
description: A toolkit to support Bluesky labelers

top.description: Rito Labeler Kit is a toolkit designed to support Bluesky labelers. It helps you from initial setup to day-to-day labeling operations.

1.title: Provided Console
1.description: You can manage everything from this site, including what kind of labels to create and the conditions under which they are automatically applied.

2.title: Railway
2.description: The labeler server and automatic labeling system run on your Railway project. Railway is a paid service with usage-based billing.

3.title: Requirements
3.description: You will need a Railway account and a new Bluesky account that will act as the labeler account.

login.title: Authentication
login.description: Please log in with the account that will (or is planned to) become the labeler.

field.pleOpe: I agree to perform PLC operations

message.plcOpe: This account is not yet a labeler. You need to perform an operation called a PLC operation, which affects the account. If you have not yet deployed Rito Labeler Kit to Railway, tap here to deploy it first.

message.versionUp: A new version of the Auto Labeling Service has been released. Please redeploy from Railway to upgrade.

initlal.posted: You have already made posts. It is recommended to use a dedicated new account for labeling. If you want to continue with a different account, tap here to log out.
initlal.seckey: A secret key will be generated. This process is handled in your browser and will not be sent to the developers of this service.
initlal.seckeyAreSensitive: Do not enter the secret key anywhere other than Railway.
initlal.complete: Congratulations! Please log out once and apply the downloaded secret key and other settings to Railway.

url.title: Railway URL
url.description: Enter the URL you plan to use on Railway.

error.bskydomain: The bsky.social domain cannot be used. Please specify a different domain.

issueAppPassword.title: Also issue an app password
issueAppPassword.description: It will be issued under the name "RitoLabelerKit". This is required for automatic label application.

plcTolen.title: PLC Authentication Code
plcTolen.description: Enter the PLC authentication code sent to you by email. It may take some time to arrive. Please also check your spam folder.

error.reqquired: The PLC authentication code is required

initlal.finalConfirm: The secret key will be embedded. Do you want to continue?

message.notRunning: Rito Labeler Kit does not appear to be running at {domain}. Please check the setup or confirm that it is running.

info.deleteConfirm: This action cannot be undone. If even one person has used this label, only the English name will remain. Are you sure you want to delete it?

key.title: English Name
key.description: Displayed in some clients. Cannot be changed later.
key.validate: Only lowercase English letters and hyphens are allowed

title.title: Title
title.description: The label name. This is displayed in most clients.

like.notice: There is usually no need to turn this off unless you are quitting this labeler. Are you sure you want to disable it?

enable.title: Likes
enable.description: Enable automatic label application based on likes

post.title: Post
post.description: Each label will be automatically posted as a tree under this post. This cannot be changed later.
post.initial: Like the post of the label you want to apply! If you cannot see the tree, please follow this account.

likeTarget.title: Target labels for like-based auto labeling
likeTarget.description: Select the labels to be automatically applied by likes

info.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this? This action cannot be undone.

label.title: Target Label
label.description: Select the label to apply or remove

appliedTo.title: Apply label to
appliedTo.description: Select whether to apply to a post or an account

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Triggers based on the content of this post.

message.length: The condition must be at least 8 characters long
message.mustmention: Mentioning the labeler account is required

durationInHours.title: Label duration
durationInHours.description: After this amount of time passes following label application, the label will be automatically removed. 0 means unlimited.

action.title: Label action
action.description: Select what to do with the label when the condition is met

inform.serverdown: The automatic labeling server is down. Please restart it on Railway.
